scripts.say: That {namecode:20} is such an idiot, she doesn’t trust what {namecode:98} says, nya...
---Nya? Oh, it’s only the Commander... it’s nothing… just that {namecode:20} said the Sakura Empire tech pack sold in store had shown a different company’s logo...
That’s impossible! All inventory has been double checked by {namecode:98}...
Nyaa? Great timing… the Commander can also join us and help test these...
I must make it so that idiot {namecode:20} will have nothing left to say, nya! ---
